article.title: Sierra Nevada to Support Tactical Systems Emulator

tags.tag: Air Force Intelligence Surveillance Reconnaissance Agency

article.text: Sierra Nevada Corp., Sparks, Nevada, has been awarded a $9,236,172 indefinite-delivery/ indefinite-quantity contract to support Tactical Systems Emulator (TSE) software, TSE System Integration Laboratory, TSE Continental United States Classroom Systems and the sustainment of these systems. Work will be performed at Beale Air Force Base (AFB), California; Ft. Bragg, North Carolina; Hurlburt AFB, Florida; and Cannon AFB, New Mexico, and is expected to be complete by June 30, 2018. This award is the result of a sole-source acquisition. No funds are being obligated at the time of award. The Air Force Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance Agency, Joint Base San Antonio - Lackland, Texas, is the contracting activity (FA7037-16-D-0007).
